name: Whizer_GermanTranslations
title: Whizer's German Translations
author: JoeWhizer
description: Adds German translation to the following mods: Advanced Solar, Autofill, Auto Recycling Plant, Bottleneck+Logistics, Concrete-and-Stone, Google Maps Factorio style, Long Reach, Modular Charge Packs, Nuclear Fission Armor, Nuclear Fuel, Nuclear Locomotives, Upgrade Builder and Planner, Shoot N Scoot, Honk
